info.official_title: A Phase IIa Exploratory Study of OCZ103-OS in Combination With Platinum-Gemcitabine Based Doublet First Line Therapy in Stage IV Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC) Patients

identified_line.line: * Written Informed Consent;

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Written Informed Consent

identified_line.line: * 18-75 years;

and_criteria.exact_snippets: 18-75 years

identified_line.line: * Histologically or cytologically confirmed stage IV NSCLC patients that are eligible to platinum-gemcitabine based doublet therapy (M1a and M1b, seventh edition descriptor of the Revised International System for Staging Lung Cancer, adopted by the AJCC.) Patients with a prior diagnosis of stage IIIa or IIIb NSCLC who have progressed to stage IV are also eligible;

criterions.exact_snippets: eligible to platinum-gemcitabine based doublet therapy
M1a and M1b, seventh edition descriptor of the Revised International System for Staging Lung Cancer
Patients with a prior diagnosis of stage IIIa or IIIb NSCLC who have progressed to stage IV
Patients with a prior diagnosis of stage IIIa or IIIb NSCLC who have progressed to stage IV

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Histologically or cytologically confirmed
stage IV NSCLC
eligible to platinum-gemcitabine based doublet therapy
M1a and M1b, seventh edition descriptor of the Revised International System for Staging Lung Cancer
Patients with a prior diagnosis of stage IIIa or IIIb NSCLC who have progressed to stage IV
Patients with a prior diagnosis of stage IIIa or IIIb NSCLC who have progressed to stage IV
eligible to platinum-gemcitabine based doublet therapy

identified_line.line: * Life expectancy of at least 3 months

criterions.exact_snippets: Life expectancy of at least 3 months

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Life expectancy of at least 3 months

identified_line.line: * Clinically significant renal impairment or chronic pancreatitis;
* History of clinically significant hypoglycemia, with fasting blood glucose < 3 mmol/L;

and_criteria.exact_snippets: History of clinically significant hypoglycemia
fasting blood glucose < 3 mmol/L

identified_line.line: * Inadequate baseline organ function as shown by following laboratory values:

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Inadequate baseline organ function

identified_line.line: * Hemoglobin < 100 g/L
* Absolute neutrophil count <1.5 x 10e9/L
* Platelet count < 100 x 10e9/L

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Platelet count < 100 x 10e9/L

identified_line.line: * Total bilirubin > 1.5 x ULN

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Total bilirubin > 1.5 x ULN

identified_line.line: * AST and ALT > 2.5 x ULN or > 5 ULN in the presence of liver metastases

criterions.exact_snippets: AST and ALT ... > 5 ULN in the presence of liver metastases
criterions.criterion: AST and ALT levels with liver metastases

and_criteria.exact_snippets: AST and ALT > 2.5 x ULN
AST and ALT ... > 5 ULN in the presence of liver metastases
and_criteria.criterion: AST and ALT levels with liver metastases

and_criteria.exact_snippets: AST and ALT ... > 5 ULN in the presence of liver metastases
and_criteria.criterion: AST and ALT levels with liver metastases

identified_line.line: * Serum creatinine > 1.5 x ULN or calculated creatinine clearance < 60 ml/min
* To be dependent of oxygen treatment;
* Active infections requiring antibiotics;
* A major surgical procedure, open biopsy, or significant traumatic injury within 28 days of beginning treatment, or anticipation of the need for major surgery during the course of the study;

criterions.exact_snippets: A major surgical procedure, open biopsy, or significant traumatic injury within 28 days of beginning treatment
criterions.criterion: recent major surgical procedure, open biopsy, or significant traumatic injury

criterions.exact_snippets: anticipation of the need for major surgery during the course of the study

and_criteria.exact_snippets: A major surgical procedure, open biopsy, or significant traumatic injury within 28 days of beginning treatment
and_criteria.criterion: recent major surgical procedure, open biopsy, or significant traumatic injury

or_criteria.exact_snippets: anticipation of the need for major surgery during the course of the study

identified_line.line: * Active alcohol or drug abuse;
* Known or suspected allergy/hypersensitivity to any agent given in the course of this trial;

criterions.exact_snippets: Known or suspected allergy/hypersensitivity to any agent given in the course of this trial

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Known or suspected allergy/hypersensitivity to any agent given in the course of this trial

identified_line.line: * Any co-morbid condition that in the judgment of the investigator renders the subject at high risk of treatment complication or reduces the probability of assessing clinical effect;

criterions.exact_snippets: Any co-morbid condition ... renders the subject at high risk of treatment complication
Any co-morbid condition ... reduces the probability of assessing clinical effect

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Any co-morbid condition ... renders the subject at high risk of treatment complication
Any co-morbid condition ... reduces the probability of assessing clinical effect

identified_line.line: * Other malignancies diagnosed within the last 5 years with the exception of Basal Cell Carcinoma of the skin;

criterions.exact_snippets: Other malignancies diagnosed within the last 5 years
exception of Basal Cell Carcinoma of the skin
criterions.criterion: Basal Cell Carcinoma of the skin

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Other malignancies diagnosed within the last 5 years

not_criteria.exact_snippets: exception of Basal Cell Carcinoma of the skin
not_criteria.criterion: Basal Cell Carcinoma of the skin

identified_line.line: * Patients unable to comply with the study protocol and follow-up schedule for any psychological, familial, sociological or geographical reason.

criterions.exact_snippets: unable to comply with the study protocol and follow-up schedule
criterions.criterion: compliance with study protocol and follow-up schedule

not_criteria.exact_snippets: unable to comply with the study protocol and follow-up schedule
not_criteria.criterion: compliance with study protocol and follow-up schedule

identified_line.line: * Any of the following conditions: Ongoing cardiac dysrhythmias of NCI CTCAE grade â‰¥ 2; atrial fibrillation of any grade; QTc interval > 450 msec for males or > 470 msec for females or uncontrolled intercurrent illness, e.g. unstable angina; severe coronary disease, ventricular arrhythmias, bradycardia < 50 bpm; a history of additional risk factors for torsades de pointes (e.g., heart failure, hypokalemia or family history of Long QT Syndrome);

criterions.exact_snippets: Ongoing cardiac dysrhythmias of NCI CTCAE grade â‰¥ 2
uncontrolled intercurrent illness, e.g. unstable angina
a history of additional risk factors for torsades de pointes
criterions.criterion: risk factors for torsades de pointes

criterions.exact_snippets: family history of Long QT Syndrome
criterions.criterion: family history of Long QT Syndrome

uncontrolled intercurrent illness, e.g. unstable angina
a history of additional risk factors for torsades de pointes
or_criteria.criterion: risk factors for torsades de pointes

or_criteria.exact_snippets: family history of Long QT Syndrome
or_criteria.criterion: family history of Long QT Syndrome

identified_line.line: * Males or females;
* ECOG performance 0 or 1;
* One or more tumor lesions measurable by RECIST criteria version 1.1, on CT scan or MRI;

criterions.exact_snippets: tumor lesions measurable by RECIST criteria version 1.1

and_criteria.exact_snippets: tumor lesions measurable by RECIST criteria version 1.1

identified_line.line: * Patients with previous radiotherapy as definitive therapy for locally advanced non-small cell lung cancer are eligible, as long as the selected measurable lesions are outside the original radiation therapy port unless there has been demonstrated progression in the lesion. Radiation therapy must have been completed > 4 weeks prior to study entry;

criterions.exact_snippets: previous radiotherapy as definitive therapy for locally advanced non-small cell lung cancer
criterions.criterion: previous radiotherapy for locally advanced non-small cell lung cancer

criterions.exact_snippets: selected measurable lesions are outside the original radiation therapy port

requirement.expected_value: outside the original radiation therapy port

criterions.exact_snippets: unless there has been demonstrated progression in the lesion
Radiation therapy must have been completed > 4 weeks prior to study entry

and_criteria.exact_snippets: previous radiotherapy as definitive therapy for locally advanced non-small cell lung cancer
and_criteria.criterion: previous radiotherapy for locally advanced non-small cell lung cancer

and_criteria.exact_snippets: completion of radiation therapy must have been completed > 4 weeks prior to study entry

or_criteria.exact_snippets: unless there has been demonstrated progression in the lesion

identified_line.line: * Palliative radiotherapy must have been completed > 2 weeks prior to study entry. Concomitant palliative radiotherapy to an existing bone lesion for pain control is allowed;

criterions.exact_snippets: Palliative radiotherapy must have been completed > 2 weeks prior to study entry.
Concomitant palliative radiotherapy to an existing bone lesion for pain control is allowed

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Palliative radiotherapy must have been completed > 2 weeks prior to study entry.

not_criteria.exact_snippets: Concomitant palliative radiotherapy to an existing bone lesion for pain control is allowed

identified_line.line: Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Any prior systemic therapy for recurrent or metastatic NSCLC, except prior neoadjuvant or adjuvant systemic chemotherapy for NSCLC if administered at least 6 months prior to enrolment;

criterions.exact_snippets: Any prior systemic therapy for recurrent or metastatic NSCLC
criterions.criterion: prior systemic therapy for recurrent or metastatic NSCLC

criterions.exact_snippets: except prior neoadjuvant or adjuvant systemic chemotherapy for NSCLC if administered at least 6 months prior to enrolment
criterions.criterion: prior neoadjuvant or adjuvant systemic chemotherapy for NSCLC

identified_line.line: * Systolic Blood Pressure < 100 mmHg (if deemed clinically significant by the treating physician);

criterions.exact_snippets: if deemed clinically significant by the treating physician

identified_line.line: * Uncontrolled diabetes. Patients with well controlled diabetes, with a HbA1C of less than 7%, on stable hypoglycaemic therapy and diet, are eligible;
* Pregnancy or breastfeeding. All women of child-bearing potential must have a negative pregnancy test prior to first receiving protocol therapy;

criterions.exact_snippets: All women of child-bearing potential must have a negative pregnancy test

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Pregnancy
All women of child-bearing potential must have a negative pregnancy test
